mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student (name, hurigana, nickname, mailaddress, area, age, sex, remark, is_deleted) VALUES (#{name}, #{hurigana}, #{nickname}, #{mailaddress}, #{area}, #{age}, #{sex}, #{remark}, false)
mapper.update: UPDATE student SET name = #{name}, hurigana = #{hurigana}, nickname = #{nickname}, mailaddress = #{mailaddress}, area = #{area}, age = #{age}, sex = #{sex}, remark = #{remark}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO studentsCourses (student_id, course_name, start_date, end_date) VALUES (#{studentID}, #{courseName}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE studentsCourses SET course_name = #{courseName} WHERE course_id = #{courseID}
